captions.text: Its enough. This is over..
I don’t want to listen anymore explanations. Let's finish this with breakup..
Is it a Love problem ?
Its none of your business
Sorry !!
Its ok. Let me know the problem.
May be I can help you.

He changed a lot. Became completely selfish.
He wants me to do

whatever he says. He wants me
to inform him where ever I go.
May be he is concerned so much about you.
He wants me to tell him before I decide anything.
May be he is trying to cover your immaturity with his maturity.
I mean, he doesn’t want you to fall in trouble by taking wrong decisions in confusion.
Even you are showing your male attitude.
what’s wrong if he wants you to inform him before where ever you go.

Forcing you to do whatever
he says is wrong but asking

you to inform him before you
do something is not wrong.

- U mean to say its all my fault.
- Its nobody’s fault.

I mean Things done Intentionally are wrong.
Unintentional are mistakes.
In Love, there will be only unintentional mistakes.

Fine, leave all those apart. He is not the same as before.
He used to be very nice and jovial with my friends.
His behaviour has changed a lot.

I liked him for his jovial nature,
but he is being more selfish day by day.

Yesterday he behaved so weird with my
friends as they were making fun of me.
And now they are ignoring me.
That itself shows how much he loves and cares for you.

That’s what I am saying. He is not even understanding
what he is doing in the name of Love.
He is acting so wierd.
Fine, Can I ask you one question?

Let's say four persons are in danger
and you can save only one.
Whom will you save ?
Depends on situation and persons.
If your boy friend is among them, then ?
Sure you will save your boy friend right ?
Then, Is this not selfishness ?
Even others are also in same situation, then why not save any one of them ?
If a terrorist dies, everyone will celebrate except his mother.
She is concerned about her son's death.
Its her love for her son which blinds her.
Even if our team is not playing well,
We’ll hope that we should win the match some how.
Is that not selfishness ?
See...
"Selfishness is the corner stone for every Relationship"

- So...
- A lover must be selfish. Because the whole world runs on love.
There is no love without selfishness.
There is no relation without love, and there is no world without relations.

- So what do you suggest me to do ?
- Just Say Sorry !!
How many times will this sorry business work ?
Till love exists...
because Love is not a Right. It’s a Responsibility.
Why should I take the lead everytime to say sorry..
Coz its you who disconnected the call when he was trying to explain..
May be he called you to say sorry..
What if he didn’t call me to say sorry ?
To clap and make a sound, both the hands should come together.

So why not take the lead.
If you can't talk to him directly, atleast call him.
OK, I’ll call him now.
Hello, I wanna tell you something.
Not in phone, will tell you directly.
“I am really sorry“
“Thank God!! You are convinced”
Actually I should have apologized as it was my mistake.
Ohh yeah
You should only apologize. So say it.
I have already apologized, to your friends.
I am coming right from your friends.
Don’t divert the topic.

To solve problems, its our routine business to talk
like “Strangers” whenever we fight.
Then what is the need of saying sorry.
U still didn’t say sorry.

BTW, your favourite star Pawan Kalyan’s
Gabbarsingh-2 movie got released.

- I have booked tickets for the evening show.
- Really! Wow... Sooo sweet of you.

- “you should only buy popcorn”
- Sure. Anyways its obvious right ?
As if you are only spending money everytime.
Leave it and sing our Fav song which made us to fall in Love.
Girl singing.......!!

- Boy singing......!!
- Hey what is it..
Please don’t start again...
Else I have to watch Venkee’s movie to become a stranger again....

title: Strangers About Love || Telugu Latest Short Film On Love 2015 || Presented By RunwayReel
